summary: Frontend UI/UX testing completed for The Vault Club DeFi platform. All major UI enhancements are working correctly including Nunito font, earnings display, bar charts, timeline tabs, and light mode text contrast fixes.

issues: Timeline tabs (1M, 1Y, All, Future+) have slightly muted appearance in light mode - could benefit from slightly darker text

context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI/UX enhancements verified working: 1) Nunito font loaded from Google Fonts, 2) '$X Earned This Week' displays on homepage with timeline tabs, 3) Bar chart on homepage shows Day 1-7, 4) Future page has beautiful bar chart with Y1-Y15 labels (purple for early years, orange for wBTC phase), 5) Light mode text contrast is good across all pages, 6) More Details dropdown works on Future page. Contract modal with strand details could not be tested as it requires wallet connection and contract creation.

homepage_earnings_display.details: Displays '$0.00 Earned This Week' with green indicator dot

timeline_tabs.details: 1W, 1M, 1Y, All, Future+ tabs visible and clickable

homepage_bar_chart.details: Bar chart displays with Day 1-7 labels and purple bars

future_page_bar_chart.details: Beautiful bar chart with Y1-Y15 labels, purple bars for early years (Y1-Y7), orange bars for wBTC phase (Y8-Y15)

light_mode_text_contrast.details: Text is readable across all pages in light mode - titles, labels, stats all have good contrast

simulation_parameters_labels.details: Strand APY labels, wBTC Price, Simulation Length, Investment Rigor all readable in both modes

nunito_font.details: Nunito font loaded from Google Fonts, applied via CSS, gives softer/rounded appearance

navigation_bar.details: Bottom nav with Home, Wallet, Contracts, Data, Future all functional

more_details_dropdown.details: Expands/collapses correctly on Future page, shows Peak Strand Distribution info

contract_modal_strand_details.details: Requires wallet connection and contract creation to test - code review shows modal is implemented
